#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long int power(long long int base,long long int exp)
{
    if(exp==0)
    return 1;

    long long int temp = power(base,exp/2);
    if(exp%2==0)
    return temp*temp;
    else return base*temp*temp;
}

int main()
{
    long long int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
       cin>>n;
       long long int ctr= log(n)/log(2),ans=1;
       for(int i=0;i<ctr;++i)
       {
           ans*=2;
       }
       cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
